title: Enlil Gate
description: The Enlil Gate is one of Babylon's eight city gates and it is situated on the northwestern side of the inner city, directly north of the Bāb-Lugalerra quarter. King Nebuchadnezzar II built the gate ca. 575 B.C.

properties.description: The proposed location of the Enlil Gate is based on a plan of the ruins of Babylon, with 500 m UTM coordinates.
properties.title: Proposed location of the Enlil Gate
